name: EggBeat
description:
EggBeat is a game where you need to keep an egg up in the air by tapping it with the keys from your keyboard! Keep the egg up in the air for as long as you can. Brag to your friends about how you spent 2 hours getting a 1000 score, and notice how nobody will care about it after the fact.

Enjoy!

Demo Video:

(UPDATE, 10/1/2017)

Fixed bug where the first hit wouldn't be registered if hit at the right moment. Also smoothed position and timing correction a bit. It's still noticeable at the top of the parabola, but it generally looks better.

(UPDATE, 10/1/2017)

Timing for song is slightly improved, along with other small improvements to graphics and the timing scripts. Now there is also a dedicated key ("R") for retrying. (Thanks to homer_3 for the idea!)

There is also now a working HTML 5 version, so please go and try it out! Thank you!

(UPDATE, 9/27/2017)

Uploaded a Zipped build of the last update; Windows 10 was reporting that the all-in-one executable was a potential threat due to the file compressor used. This build should work fine, just run it from the ZIP file.

(UPDATE, 9/25/2017)

Fixed speed issue on lower-end machines.
